name: Profile Enrichment (Prefill)
description: This service enriches user profiles by pre-filling detailed information such as full name, date of birth, address, phone numbers, and email addresses based on the provided mobile number and name. It aids in streamlining onboarding and credit risk assessment processes.
llm_summary: The Profile Enrichment (Prefill) service retrieves and pre-fills user details like name, address, and contact information using a mobile number and name, enhancing onboarding and credit risk evaluations.
use_cases: Streamlining user onboarding by pre-filling profile details.
Enhancing credit risk assessment with enriched user data.
Reducing manual data entry errors during KYC processes.
